author: C. Tomlin, Ed.S.
text: I've tried to avoid hearing the song,  Dance with My Father by Luther Vandross for almost 3 years....heard a clip this morning as I was scrolling thru social media....😭😭😭😭💔💔💔

author: C. Tomlin, Ed.S.
text: I'm trying to do better at delivery though. 😖 https://t.co/i6hiE4aepD

author: C. Tomlin, Ed.S.
text: Join us at Daffin Park today for lots of family fun! https://t.co/AuUAyMR5SL

author: C. Tomlin, Ed.S.
text: Almost a year ago I received this... what might God I serve when I think of all I've overcome personally.... the race is not given to the swift or to the strong, but to the one that endures to the end. https://t.co/THDRtG1nv4

author: C. Tomlin, Ed.S.
text:
Gift from a teacher who I mentored this year as she completed the Ed.S program at VSU in Instructional Technology. If ANYBODY know the tedious journey of that degree, it's me! 

I don't do it for recognition, I just do God's will. I would do it all over again. Congratulations,RK! https://t.co/5aOc9oOHrI

author: C. Tomlin, Ed.S.
text: Always! https://t.co/5wraYFcDQ0

author: C. Tomlin, Ed.S.
text: Congratulations!!! https://t.co/kCsHDSLHwz

author: C. Tomlin, Ed.S.
text: There is a shift....I feel it. Allow Your will to be done, Lord. 💛💙

author: C. Tomlin, Ed.S.
text: Nothing like fresh flowers to liven up your place. Make it a great Sunday! https://t.co/QlNFcfhu9r

author: C. Tomlin, Ed.S.
text: This right here!🙌🏾 https://t.co/DmUejnJXha

author: C. Tomlin, Ed.S.
text: I have gotten way past covid but I'm still winded when I walk even the shortest distance and have a lingering headache. 😫

author: C. Tomlin, Ed.S.
text: Ever just think back and be like, "wow, I've been through all of this and I'm still standing?!" His grace is definitely sufficient.

author: C. Tomlin, Ed.S.
text: Whew chile....Courtney!😒😫 #AbbottElementary

author: C. Tomlin, Ed.S.
text: My Friday nights are made since BET bought back New York Undercover!🙌🏾 #NYUndercoverBET

author: C. Tomlin, Ed.S.
text: I love it when my dad appears in my dream. 💜

author: C. Tomlin, Ed.S.
text: I really want to move to Jacksonville. I'm going to pray about that.

author: C. Tomlin, Ed.S.
text: The dizziness 😩 everybody looks one sided and I can't stand that! #vertigosucks

author: C. Tomlin, Ed.S.
text: Grateful that I see my own lab reports from my MRI but these findings aren't adding up to the results. Not that I'm trying to make something to be something but this isn't making sense.

author: C. Tomlin, Ed.S.
text: Next Thanksgiving, God's will, I'm definitely flying somewhere. I've got to.

author: C. Tomlin, Ed.S.
text: My reality: as of last night, my grandmother no longer has use of her legs. Dementia is from the pits of hell.

author: C. Tomlin, Ed.S.
text: He's a class act. I truly hope the Braves resign him! https://t.co/kE7vNJEgFe

author: C. Tomlin, Ed.S.
text: I'm seriously tired of storing contacts in my phone for temporary people. https://t.co/eM3q7nli1N

author: C. Tomlin, Ed.S.
text:
Great morning from my alma mater!

Disclaimer: yes I am safe. The shooting that happened was off campus last night. No worries, I will continue to be safe. 💛💙 https://t.co/4nVqat70XF

author: C. Tomlin, Ed.S.
text: Man, the atmosphere is so electric!!! https://t.co/7B0BPv49Ff

author: C. Tomlin, Ed.S.
text: This time last year I was not in a good place emotionally. Had done started divorce proceedings and still dealing with grief. Life was just so bland. But in the mist of it all, God kept me together. I think back on it, I know it was Him that did it! #HesAKeeper🙌🏾

author: C. Tomlin, Ed.S.
text: Tryin to tell ya! https://t.co/llWRXW903O

author: C. Tomlin, Ed.S.
text: Really like homie but I think his grief is really overwhelming him to a point he's not ready to date and THAT my friends is ok. I've been there and am still there! Loss of a parent is something you don't really get over. You just adjust.

author: C. Tomlin, Ed.S.
text: Dating is scary after divorce but I must say, the date I had this evening was really nice. Nice to have conversation about everything..literally..from the loss of a parent, to our jobs & quirks that get on nerves but yet makes us different.

author: C. Tomlin, Ed.S.
text: Theres nothing like praying and ugly crying. I really had some heavy stuff to drop off to Jesus this morning🙌🏾

author: C. Tomlin, Ed.S.
text: I'm not sure what allergen is in the air but I'm having a hard time with my breathing. Feels like someone heavy is resting on my chest. I've had my albuterol by my side the whole evening.  Asthma sucks!

author: C. Tomlin, Ed.S.
text: Do you remember when you joined Twitter? I do! #MyTwitterAnniversary https://t.co/iFP8SNeqdR

author: C. Tomlin, Ed.S.
text: I don't understand why folks are committed to misunderstanding me?! What gives?

author: C. Tomlin, Ed.S.
text: Sending love, light and healing to @ronaldacunajr24 !

author: C. Tomlin, Ed.S.
text: This season happened for God to get the Glory. This was no doing of my own. Trials come to make me stronger and wiser.

author: C. Tomlin, Ed.S.
text:
The joy that's down in my heart.....the world didnt give it to me and the world can't take it away. 
6 months ago, I couldn't say this because of heartache and turmoil that all just happened at the same time. But GOD has the ultimate power through prayer and supplication!🙌🏾

author: C. Tomlin, Ed.S.
text: God has been so good, I just can't tell it all!🙌🏾 I don't look like what I've been through..💃🏾💃🏾💃🏾🏃🏾‍♀️🏃🏾‍♀️

author: C. Tomlin, Ed.S.
text: Agreed! https://t.co/VtLDOEsS1w

author: C. Tomlin, Ed.S.
text: Getting out to the beach today really helped my mood. Ive been dreading this weekend because I didn't know how grief was going to do me but im good for now..... check back with me on actual Father's Day.... https://t.co/Ae1JcGyLR6

author: C. Tomlin, Ed.S.
text: My dad is heavily on my mind today as we go into this weekend... ugh how I wish this was not my reality...💔 https://t.co/nYBwYAiqUh

author: C. Tomlin, Ed.S.
text: Thank you SCCPSS for that very welcomed GREAT news!!🙌🏾🙌🏾🙌🏾

author: C. Tomlin, Ed.S.
text: I'm giving you giving you visual, darlin'....this is what happy looks like!❤ https://t.co/Oq7wQJDU48

author: C. Tomlin, Ed.S.
text: I'm registered at Target and Amazon for those who would like to bless my place! I will not be hosting a housewarming party at this time.

author: C. Tomlin, Ed.S.
text: Splurging on myself this evening! Day 1 of vacation! After the hellish year I've had in my personal life, I deserve this!!! https://t.co/z6iTFXH8Wv

author: C. Tomlin, Ed.S.
text: Nothing like that prayer where you're praying so hard you start crying.... deliverance can now take place...#Release
